results.title: Garden Banner, inspirational floral banner, wedding garland
results.description:
Floral Garden Banner - Perfect for wedding decoration, summer party or to brighten up any room in your home. This is one of my favorite banners because it is so positive and soothing.  The banner is made with Simples Stories Garden District paper collection and charming light blue polka dot cardstock.    The panels measure 6 x 4 inches with metal eyelets that hang on a light blue twine.  There is hand dyed crinkled seam binding ribbon combined with a cream colored crinkled ribbon. Each panel has a fringe cut bottom. Embellishments pop off the banner with foam backings.
1- Today is the Day saying embellished with butterflies and a sweet sparkling bee.
2- Today is the Day saying with floral drawings and firefly embellishment. Today ticket stub.
3- Live Laugh Love messaging inside a floral wreath and rose print embellishment.
4- The Simple Life - white and black text background with flowers butterflies and flowers. Butterfly kisses message above trim.
5- Live Love and Enjoy Life - ephermal vintage floral background paper with flower bouquet embellishment.
6- Best Day Ever message with more lovely flowers and joyful ticket stub.
7- Dream Big Message - sweet drawing of large rose and other pastel flowers.

Come visit my shop PaperWild on Etsy.  I have created many items with beautiful paper.
Visit at https://www.etsy.com/shop/paperwild?ref=seller-platform-mcnav
materials: hand dyed blue crinkled seam binding

results.title: Live Love Laugh Pillow with Words White Lumbar 12 x 18 Made in Canada
results.description:
Words of inspiration for your home or office decor, Live Love Laugh painted on the front of this 12" X 18" lumbar pillow case.

Polyester insert included.

The words Live and Love are painted in stone grey, the word Love painted in soft rosy peach.

Quality non toxic fabric paints used, will not wash off, flake or rub off.

Fabric is crisp white cotton twill, seams double stitched for durability and overcast to prevent fraying.  Envelope closure.

Hand wash in cold, lay flat to dry, avoid direct contact on painted area with hot iron.

Handmade in Canada by me, ready to ship.

See more inspirational pillows here:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/BrushAndFeather?section_id=7286987

results.title: Wall Art Decal | Live Laugh Love | Vinyl Wall Decal
results.description:
All of our decals are made from high quality, permanent, self-adhesive vinyl. All items are personalized with outdoor vinyl. Outdoor vinyl is water resistant and has an outdoor durability of 2-7 years.

 Removable vinyl wall decal
~Any sample photo used is for illustrative purposes. Measure area to ensure good fit.

 Apply decals in area that is out of reach of small children.
~This product is one time application. The decals are removable, but not reusable. 
~ Due to condition and age of walls prior to application, small damage may occur upon removal
~ Our decals are made with high quality removable vinyl and are custom cut when purchased.
~ Our removable high quality matt vinyl decals when applied to the wall look painted on!
~ Removable wall decals can be applied to almost all clean, smooth, dust and grease free surface. 
~ Please wait at least 3 weeks after painting walls to allow the paint to cure. 
~ We recommend installation to smooth, semi-gloss or gloss enamel paint. If possible, avoid matte finish Latex paints and paints that contain anti-graffiti agents or stain blockers as well as VOC free paints, sand paints and suede paints. 
~ Not recommended for application to unpainted wood, textured walls, stucco, concrete, brick or over grout lines.

Included in your order is detailed step-by-step application instructions

LOVE

Wrap this bracelet around your wrist ...
knot three times and make a wish

that is when your
WISH

results.title: Gifts for the family, sit long, laugh much sign ,where life begins and Love never ends. Custom family sign/plaque. Keepsakes to treasure.
results.description:
There is nothing quite like the personal touch and family signs make fabulous gifts for one and all whatever the occasion. 

A beautiful keepsake made in a shabby chic style, each plaque is handmade and hand painted with your name, or family where life begins and love never ends. Every plaque can be customised and adapted to suit you. Our shabby chic wall art is tied and finished with raffia, ribbon or hessian jute. The ribbon used in the photographs may or may not be used on your sign depending on availability,  We will do our best to supply the ribbon of your choice, but if there is a lack of availability or stock we will supply an alternative,

If you have a personal preference for wording, or colours please send us a message.

As with my other signs this one is completely handmade by me, each sign is painted and sanded back to reveal the wood and wood garain beneath. Individual markings will differ slightly from sign to sign. 

Thanks for visiting Signsatsimplywood
find us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/signsatsimplywood/

results.title: Live Life Definition Garden Stone | Gifts for Friends | Bookshelf Blocks | Live Laugh Love Decor | Concrete Stone |
results.description:
Live Life defined "the magical and remarkable gift of time and choice given to each of us for an undetermined number of years...".  This rustic brick paver is the perfect one of a kind, handmade gift for the special person in your life.

Heavy concrete stone that has been weatherproof sealed for indoor and outdoor use.  

Measures approx 3.5 x 7.5 inches 

Shown here for life...but we also offer several additional designs!  Be sure to check them out in our shop.   
Back to Our Shop: https://www.etsy.com/shop/purpleheartpallet?section_id=25470285


Thank you for visiting and supporting our shop!  In memory of our mentor and patriarch, David P. Shepard, Sr. (USMC) a % of each sale is donated back to Veterans and their families.  

For more information: https://www.etsy.com/shop/PurpleHeartPallet/about?ref=announce

Thanks Again!

**Note**
We do not ENGRAVE our stones.  We use a combination of high quality ink and exterior paint for the design. Then we coat all sides with an extreme weatherproof sealant...so they are perfect for indoor AND outdoor use.

results.title: Life Is Short Make It Sweet SVG, Live Laugh Love SVG, Live Life in Full Bloom SVG, Live Your Life to the Fullest svg, Inspirational svg
results.description:
Want More Savings? You may purchase this item + 14 other designs in a BUNDLE! Check it out on this link:

https://www.etsy.com/listing/845329818/motivational-quote-bundle-svg?ref=shop_home_active_1

Life Is Short Make It Sweet | Motivational Digital Cut Files - Svg, Dxf, Png, and Jpg

💙Handmade item
💙Craft type: Card making & stationery, Printing & printmaking, Scrapbooking
💙Digital Download: 1 ZIP included
💙Materials: SVG, PNG, DXF, JPG

💙 AFTER DOWNLOADING : You'll receive a *ZIP folder containing all purchased files. You’ll need a computer to unzip and to open your files!

THIS ITEM INCLUDES:

1 ZIP file containing digital files in the following formats:
SVG, DXF, PNG and JPG.

SVG, DXF, PNG, JPG formats allows you to use your files across a wide range of cutting machines. They are suitable for use in Cricut Design Space, Sure Cuts A Lot, Make The Cut, and the Silhouette Designer Edition. You can use it for mugs, decals, T-shirts, scrapbooking, and so much more! Before purchasing, please make sure your cutting machine is compatible with any of the file formats included in the purchase.

REMINDERS!!!
💙 .SVG files are vector files and can be resized (scaled) to any size without losing image quality. Just use vector graphics software to edit my final designs.

💙 If you need another formats of files, just contact me via Etsy convo and I'll help you.

💙 If you have Silhouette Studio Basic Edition you can NOT drag and drop the SVG file into the work area to access the file. Please use the DXF file instead.

💙 To Unzip the file you downloaded, do one of the following:
1. Right Click the folder, select EXTRACT ALL and follow the instructions.
2. Open the zipped folder, then drag the files to a new location.

💙 Maybe used for personal and commercial business (up to 500 sales per design)

💙 Do not alter, resell, or share this file.

Only @iCraftByCheryn! Enjoy!

results.title: KIT OR CHART - Cross stitch Christmas Cards and Ornaments - 3 modern cute, easy robin designs, fun xmas craft cross stitch patterns
results.description:
CROSS STITCH KIT or CHART PACK - Christmas Robins - Bird Says Tweet - 3 Christmas cards or ornaments cross stitch kit.

Cross stitch Christmas cards and ornaments designs - 3 modern cute, easy robin home decor designs, fun xmas craft cross stitch patterns. 

Live laugh love, Merry Christmas and Season's greetings are 3 cute little Christmas bird designs to cross stitch as modern Xmas ornaments, extra special Christmas cards or even to personalise your own Christmas stockings. Live laugh love is a perfect gift for a couple or newly weds. These sweet little fluffy birds are full of character and are designed by me for you with a smile :)  They make a great cross stitch project to get you in the mood for Christmas. 

Make your own cute little Robins with this unique design from Bird Says Tweet. This modern kit is fun to stitch Full of cheeky fun, given as a gift they are sure to be a hit with family and friends of all ages, if you are able to part with them :). 
So cute everyone will want one, so leave time to stitch a few extra projects in time for Christmas.

Kit with 14 count aida - £25.00
Kit with 28 count linen - £25.00
Chart Pack (paper only) - £9.00
Digital Download Pack - £8.00 - see PDF collection

Each cross stitch kit contains:-

* 14 count aida or 28 count linen - please make choice when ordering (Note: Aida is easier to stitch on for beginners)
* DMC pre-sorted stranded cotton on thread organiser cards (including special metallic thread)
* 3 colour charts
* Large colour photograph of the finished project for reference.
* Stitching instructions
* Beginners cross stitch support document
* Gold plated needle

Please note: kits do not include hoops


Each chart pack (paper only) includes:-

* 3 colour charts
* Large colour photograph of the finished project for reference.* Thread requirements
* 3 thread organiser cards
* Stitching instructions
* Beginners cross stitch support document


This design is also available as an instant pdf download (no materials included) so you can get stitching right away. See pdf - Instant Download Collection In The Birdsaystweet Etsy Shop.

All packaging is fully recyclable. 


Finished size of each design:
* See details below

 
If you are new to cross stitching, I include a support sheet to cover all the basics that will help you to follow my charts and create your own personalised works of art.

All my charts / patterns use full cross stitches, fractional stitches to add more detail or smooth edges, and long stitches to add my own signature details such as bird fluff and fir leaves, also for outlining parts of the design and adding metallic highlights.

There are 3 patterns for this Bird Says Tweet set. Each of the 3 bird projects has a colour pattern of its own and includes a colour chart filling a full page, with colour symbols, a thread legend (I use DMC floss thread colours) and a large colour photograph of the finished project for reference. There is also my help sheet with everything you need to help you get started on your project. 

Bird Says Tweet - Christmas Bunting Designs 
     Christmas Robin - Merry Christmas
    Christmas Robin - Mistletoe Love - live laugh love
    Christmas Robin - Season's Greetings

The finished sizes of each chart/pattern on 14 count Aida or 28 count Evenweave are 3.2 x 3.3 inch (8.3 x 8.4 cm), 3.2 x 3.0 inch (8.3 x 7.6 cm) and 3.4 x 3.9 inch (8.5 x 9.8 cm). All three designs will fit a 4 inch (10cm) wooden hoop as shown in the photographs above. (If you choose a different fabric count your finished project size will vary). My finished projects shown above are stitched on 28 count Evenweave and are framed in 4 inch (10cm) hoops. (Please note: hoops are not included in the kit).

This listing is for three counted cross stitch charts/patterns, which when stitched by you, will look like the examples shown in my photographs. You are not buying the completed project, only the kit or chart detailed above.  

Please don't hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions about the charts or kits. Email latchfarmstudios@btinternet.com. Please see my Shop Policies regarding refunds on products before you purchase.

Website - www.birdsaystweet.co.uk
FACEBOOK - www.facebook.com/Latchfarmstudios  
Twitter - @latchfarmstudio
Instagram - @latchfarmstudios

(PLEASE OBSERVE COPYRIGHT)
© Sandra O'Connor - Latch Farm Studios - Bird Says Tweet
All patterns/charts and the designs the patterns are based on, plus all help sheets provided, are copyright protected and may not be redistributed, reproduced, or shared with anyone either as Bird Says Tweet designs or your own. Please see my Shop Policies for further details.

All photographs are © 2020 Sandra O'Connor - Latch Farm Studios - Bird Says Tweet. Any use of these photographs on your blog or any other site must include a credit and link to birdsaystweet.etsy.com   Thank you :)

results.title: Shitty Kitty-  Live Laugh Love - Ringer Tshirt - Unisex
results.description:
Shitty Kitty knows best!

Incredibly soft, vintage feel tee from Next Level. Never screen printed where inks are raised and feel scratchy, our tees are all digitally printed by hand for that extra step of adding a vintage feel to your finished shirt.

$2 from every shirt will be donated to FAIRFIGHT.COM - cause, DEMOCRACY Y'ALL!

Slight modifications in ink color may occur on darker colored shirts.

Fabric:
4.3 oz., 100% combed ring-spun cotton fine jersey
32 singles
Fabric laundered for reduced shrinkage
7.2 oz./lin. yd., 100% combed ring-spun cotton fine jersey
4.3 oz.,100% combed ring-spun cotton fine jersey

Features:
Binded collar and cuffs
Tear-away label
Sideseamed

Sizes: XS-3XL 

*Domestic delivery only.

_______________________________________________________________________

If you have any questions - let us know! Need a rush order, maybe a customization?  We can help!

▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄

1-2 Business Day Speedy Fast Order Processing:
Unlike most custom printed shirt shops, we custom print and ship your order in just 1-2 business days (Mon-Fri). 

**Please note that on rare occasion, some orders may be delayed an additional 1-2 days due to high volume orders during busy holiday seasons or special promotions. Although this is very rare, this may occur without notice. If you need your order shipped within 1-2 business days without a doubt, simply let us know through a direct message and we will make that note!

▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄

Shipping Discounts:
We happily offer combined shipping when you order more than 1 shirt. Place more than one shirt in your cart to see the reflected shipping discount.

▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄

Care Instructions:
Wash before wearing. Machine wash cold. Non-chlorine bleach, when needed. Tumble dry medium. Do not iron decorations/customization.

Special Note:
Designs shown are typical of printing onto a medium size shirt. The scale of the design will  change slightly with larger or smaller sizes. For instance, designs printed onto larger shirts will appear smaller and vice versa - not a huge difference but just a note. 

Thanks so much y'all - keep up the good fight!

Thank you!

results.title: 18 Inch Doll Clothes, Doll Dress and Bolero Jacket for Valentine's Day or Love Celebration
results.description:
Your 18 Inch doll will be cute as can be in this sleeveless classic dress with a little bolero jacket lined with red satin. The front of the dress is embellished with machine embroidery.  The bodice  is fully lined. The dress opens down the back and closes with ultra thin hook and loop tape.

These will fit your favorite soft-bodied 18" doll.

It's all for the Joy of it! I love sewing detailed, quality doll apparel that you will enjoy owning as much as I enjoyed creating it. All inside seams are finished with an overlock machine to prevent fraying and increase durability. All buttons and embellishments are hand sewn in place for the same reasons.
All items are machine wash an dry unless otherwise stated. 

The dress is made from a  combination of much modified Simplicity patterns which I have now drafted into my own pattern.

I am a Liberty Jane Partner

Dolls and accessories are not included.

Don't forget to add Pincushions and Paper to your Favorites list and like me on Facebook to see when new items are in the works!
materials: Ultra Think Hook and Loop Tape
